name: Massive Effect
description:
Massive Effect -Space shooter with multiple game modes. Destroy enemies, get experience and increase your level. Good electronic music will help you in battle.

You play as an asteroid, which by the will of fate got into the developed galaxy. Using your dust trail you will destroy various warships that were sent to destroy you. In another mode, you have to take on the role of defender of the planet and repel the enemy attack. Getting experience, you open new variations of the your asteroid!

Features
  • 2 Game modes
  • Electronic music
  • Gameplay is challenging
  • Several unique opponents
  • Pick up bonuses
